history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: colineaire. qsimpl time: 1 use: colineaire. qsimpl time: 1 use: colineaire,tangente. qsimpl time: 1 use: colineaire,tangente. qsimpl time: 1 use: colineaire,tangente. qsimpl time: 1 use: colineaire,tangente.
